Package template.xml

Class XmlExample

java.lang.Object
template.xml.XmlExample
public class XmlExample extends Object
An example for writing and reading XML, copy, modify and divide this class according it to your needs.
It uses three different inner class data objects (one containing another and a wrapped HashMap) to demonstrate the features of the template.xml packages.
Reading back needs a handler for the XML tags, this example uses org.xml.sax.ext.DefaultHandler2.
A real world implementation would not do all the stuff with inner classes, this is just for demonstration. BTW, imho it is very useful to use states and keep every XML tag as a static final String constant, often defined in an interface just for the XML tags.
